reviews.text: Manager was really top notched. She was going around to ensure everything was ok, anticipating patrons needs and checking in with the older and younger folks. Really enjoyed my breakfast there. Outlet is also in a small quiet town so chill vibes was v calming too

This McDonald’s staff are so friendly. Many elderly helpers and their leads are younger ones!

Service is pretty fast! But surprises, if you come in the night, you may have to wait a little longer! It’s a crowded place for supper! 24hrs!

Been having occasional meals at this Macdonald’s and the food is decently well. Today got a mc crispy takeout and the chicken was overcooked or probably fried a few times and it’s so hard and hardly chewable. Total disappointment, wasted the money.

On weekday , morning is it quite empty and quiet.. not many people will come for mac for breakfast.  You can eat your breakfast  peacefully and rest  before heading to work Nearby  industrial.

Nevertheless foods are as usual,  not the best, not the worse. The hasbrown is not soggy, not overcook. Just nice.

At least u got free flow of coffee.cheer

I recently stopped by McDonald's for a quick lunch.  I ordered a Filet-O-Fish, Chicken McCrispy, and a side of corn.  Everything was fresh and tasty, prepared quickly, and the service was friendly.  The McCafé coffee was a nice addition to the meal.  The restaurant was clean and well-maintained.  A convenient and satisfying dining experience.  I would definitely recommend this location!
